title: KPGA Tour Championship
text:
The KPGA Tour Championship is a professional <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament on the <a href="Korean%20Tour">Korean Tour</a>. It has generally been played in November, one of the last events of the season. The 2018 event was played at Lake Hills Golf Club in <a href="Anseong">Anseong</a>, <a href="South%20Korea">South Korea</a>.
Winners.
Source:
